meanings.definition: Publicly declare to be wrong or evil.
meanings.sent1: She denounces the unfair treatment of animals in circuses.
meanings.sent2: The activist denounces the corrupt practices of the government.
meanings.sent3: The comedian denounces bad fashion choices with humor.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes denounce her true feelings despite her smile.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm denounces the calm of the afternoon with its loud roar.

meanings.sent1: He denounces the poor quality of the product in his review.
meanings.sent2: The teacher denounces cheating in exams.
meanings.sent3: The children denounce the vegetables on their plates with exaggerated faces.
meanings.sent4: The painting denounces societal norms with its bold colors.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind denounces the fragility of the old house.
